project_descr: Improved National Capacity in implementation of  Harm Reduction Strategy; and HIV Prevention and Treatment in Penitentiary System

outputs.output_descr:
The project is aimed at increasing national capacity in implementation of harm reduction strategy; and HIV prevention and treatment in penitentiary system.
Harm reduction programmes analyzed and recommendations on their improvement provided; capacity of penitentiary system specialists is improved in the area of HIV prevention and ARV treatment

project_title: harm reduction strategy and hiv prevention and treatment
